Package ohos.media.sessioncore

Class AVVolumeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.sessioncore.AVVolumeHandler

  • public abstract class AVVolumeHandler
extends Object
    Provides methods to control volume.
    Since:
    6

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int ADJUST_MODE_ALLOW_ALL
      Indicates that both adjustment based on volume steps and direct volume setting are supported.
      static int ADJUST_MODE_ALLOW_SCROLL
      Indicates that only adjustment based on volume steps is supported.
      static int ADJUST_MODE_FORBID_ALL
      Indicates that volume adjustment is not allowed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AVVolumeHandler​(int adjustMode, int maxVolume, int currentVolume)
      A constructor used to create an AVVolumeHandler instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getVolume​()
      Obtains the current volume.
      void onScrollVolume​(int direction)
      Called after volume adjustment request is received.
      void onSetVolume​(int volume)
      Called after a volume setting request is received.
      void setVolume​(int volume)
      Notifies the system that the current volume has been changed.

        public static final int ADJUST_MODE_ALLOW_ALL
        Indicates that both adjustment based on volume steps and direct volume setting are supported.
        Since:
        6
        See Also:

        Indicates that only adjustment based on volume steps is supported.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AVVolumeHandler

        public AVVolumeHandler​(int adjustMode,
                       int maxVolume,
                       int currentVolume)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
        A constructor used to create an AVVolumeHandler instance.
        Parameters:
        adjustMode - Indicates the volume adjustment mode. The value can be ADJUST_MODE_FORBID_ALL, ADJUST_MODE_ALLOW_SCROLL, or ADJUST_MODE_ALLOW_ALL.
        maxVolume - Indicates the maximum volume allowed.
        currentVolume - Indicates the current volume, which must be lower than the maximum volume.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if an input parameter is invalid.
        Since:
        6

    • Method Detail

      • getVolume

        public final int getVolume​()
        Obtains the current volume.
        Returns:
        Returns the current volume.
        Since:
        6

      • setVolume

        public final void setVolume​(int volume)
        Notifies the system that the current volume has been changed. You should call this method when overriding the onScrollVolume(int) or onSetVolume(int) method.
        Parameters:
        volume - Indicates the changed volume.
        Since:
        6

      • onSetVolume

        public void onSetVolume​(int volume)
        Called after a volume setting request is received.

        Override this method to process the request and call setVolume(int) to notify the system after the request is processed.

        Parameters:
        volume - Indicates the volume to set.
        Since:
        6

      • onScrollVolume

        public void onScrollVolume​(int direction)
        Called after volume adjustment request is received.

        Override this method to process the request and call setVolume(int) to notify the system after the request is processed.

        Parameters:
        direction - Indicates the volume adjustment direction, which can be AudioManager#VOLUME_OP_DEC, AudioManager#VOLUME_OP_MAINTAIN, or AudioManager#VOLUME_OP_INC.
        Since:
        6
